title: BRIEF-GBM Resources To Acquire Millstream Resources
text:
BRIEF-GBM Resources To Acquire Millstream Resources

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 19:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-GBM Resources To Acquire Millstream Resources Oct 16 (Reuters) - GBM Resources Ltd : * TO ACQUIRE 100% INTEREST IN MILLSTREAM RESOURCES PTY LTD * DEAL FOR CONSIDERATION OF 150 MILLION FULLY PAID SHARES IN CAPITAL OF GBM RESOURCES * MILLSTREAM TO EARN AN INITIAL 50% JOINT VENTURE INTEREST IN WHITE DAM GOLD OPERATION * JV INTEREST PROVIDES CO OPPORTUNITY TO GENERATE CASH FLOW THROUGH HEAP LEACH GOLD PRODUCTION IN NEXT 12 MONTHS

BRIEF-GBM Resources To Acquire Millstream Resources
description: BRIEF-GBM Resources To Acquire Millstream Resources
